name: The Waving Shore Hotel
description: A beachfront hotel that offers direct access to  its very own beachfront, available to all who stay.

name: Holly Hotel
description: Holly Hotel, a jolly time at a holly price. A 4 star hotel that caters, hosts and can offer plans for bug gatherings or a weekend away.

name: Hotel Wende
description: Hotel Wende focuses on providing the best get away experience possible, with its lush garden routes and inspiring hiking trails, you will always be stunned by what you see.

name: The Shire Stay
description: A Hobbit inspired stay, created to make you feel like a hobbit at home. Perfect for a romantic getaway; or for a bunch of people to show up unannounced.

name: The Blue Wall
description: A winter wander land, Literally. This hotel is completely made of ice and snow. Only available for 3 months in a year before it melts adn is reconstructed the next year again.

name: Daring Stay
description: A truly daring stay, this hotel is built into the side of a cliff face. Not for the weak of hearts or for those with a fear for heights.

name: Sanctuary Hotel
description: This hotel is mildly inspire by Do little. A sanctuary built for animals, and a hotel where You can visit Them. Catch glimpses of Giraffes or rhinos as you eat your fod at the local restaurant.

name: Moonstone Stay
description: The perfect end of year stay, The Moonstone Hotel provides a personal stargazing bubble that allows you to watch the auroras and stargaze. A perfect honeymoon or family holiday.
